summary: Replace existing rug found on Skyrim with new ornamental and beautiful looking texture
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/Ryno_TheFallen/rugdescription_zpsa455095b.png[/IMG]
This mod aim to replace the texture of existing rug that found in Skyrim. I think that the original rug texture looks a little creepy so I decide to retextured them with more beautiful looking one. However, this mod is far from perfect, so share your suggestion and opinion in order to improve this mod. The High Resolution is used 2K (4X vanilla) texture and the standard definition is 1K(2X Vanilla)


[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/Ryno_TheFallen/ruginstallation_zpsd2daf036.png[/IMG]
-drop to /data folder or simpli use NMM to download

[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/Ryno_TheFallen/ruguninstall_zpsf20d0e1a.png[/IMG]
-Remove the file associated with this mod or use NMM


Note:
-Sorry, my english isn't well enough
-Don't forget to upload your screenshoot
author: NobleVampire
